Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class RMIClient

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.RMIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, RMIClientHandler, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIClient extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RMIClientHandler, ClientInterface
This class is the client of the RMI connection.
See Also:

    • RMIClient

      public RMIClient(String host, int port, Ui view) throws RemoteException
      The constructor of the class.
      Parameters:
      host - the address of the server.
      port - the port of the server.
      view - the view.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in the connection.

      This method sets the action to perform.
      Specified by:
      setOnConnectionAction in interface ClientInterface
      Parameters:
      response - is the action to perform.
      startingGamesId - is the list of the starting games' id.
      gamesWithDisconnectionsId - is the list of the games with disconnections id.

      public void pingNetwork() throws RemoteException
      This method responds to the server ping.
      Specified by:
      pingNetwork in interface RMIClientHandler
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error in the connection.

    • catchPing

      public void catchPing()
      This method catches the ping, resetting the timer. If the server doesn't respond in 5 seconds, it tries to reconnect.
